                                             }                                              else if (modeArr[i].ToString() == "*")                                              {                                                  nick.Modes.Add(UserMode.o);                          break;                      // On a topic reply' update the channel's topic                      case IRCReplyCode.RPL_TOPIC:                          ChannelRWLock.EnterWriteLock();                          string[] topicSplit = msg.Message.Split(new char[] { ' ' }' StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);                          if (topicSplit.GetUpperBound(0) > 0)                          {                              string topicChan = topicSplit[0];                              Channel topicChannel = Channels.Find(chan => chan.Name == topicChan);                              if (topicChannel != null)                              {                                  topicChannel.Topic = topicSplit[1].Remove(0' 1);
